Name: Naming
Description: Naming Games: Try to match a given prompt with the corresponding item.

Games.Name: Name That Musical Instrument
Games.Description: Name That Musical Instrument: try to guess the instrument from the sound it makes.

Games.Name: Name That Animal
Games.Description: Name That Animal: a classic Hark the Sound guessing game.

Games.Name: Name That Capital's State
Games.Description: Name That Capital's State: how well do you know the capitals of these states?

Games.Name: Name That Color
Games.Description: Name That Color: attempt to match common objects with their typical colors.

Games.Name: Name That Holiday
Games.Description: Name That Holiday: match these prompts with the corresponding holiday.

Games.Name: Name That Sound
Games.Description: Name That Sound: identify environmental sounds.

Games.Name: Spanish Words
Games.Description: Spanish Words: do you know the translation of these Spanish words into English?

Games.Name: State Nick Names
Games.Description: State Nick Names: match the state with its nick name.

Games.Name: Counting
Games.Description: How good are you at counting?

Games.Name: Braille letters
Games.Description: Identify Braille letters given their dots.

Games.Name: Braille whole word contractions
Games.Description: Identify Braille whole word contractions from their dots.
